title: 宇宙の騎士テッカマン

search.original_name: 宇宙の騎士テッカマン
search.overview: 21世纪的地球因公害被严重污染，人类不得不前往宇宙探寻新的居住地，可是人类的举动受到了恶党星团瓦卢达星人的阻挠，父亲被杀的南城二借用了机器人贝佳斯的力量成为坚韧的战士Tekkaman，并且向瓦卢达星发起了挑战。
search.name: 宇宙骑士铁甲人

search.overview: Duke Freed is an alien who has escaped to Earth after his home planet was invaded by the armies of Great King Yarban. Five years have passed and now Yarban's daughter, Princess Teronna, is on a mission to find both Duke and his spaceship Grendizer by invading our planet with their fleet of flying saucers. The pilot movie of Grendizer. It is about Duke Fleed, a fugitive of the planet fleed, who was kicked out of his planet by the Armies of Vega. Fleed and the daughter of the king of Vega we in love before the war between their planets. The armies of Vega continue their fight with Duke Fleed.
search.title: 宇宙圆盘大战争

title: グレートマジンガー対ゲッターロボG 空中大激突

search.original_title: グレートマジンガー対ゲッターロボＧ 空中大激突
search.overview: When a UFO arrives from space and attacks the Getter Institute, Getter Robo is launched to stop it; but the might of the UFO and its giant space monsters prove to be too much for the Getter team. Not only is Getter Robo defeated, but Ouishan is killed in action! With Getter Robo out of commission, the world's only hope appears to be Great Mazinger, but the aliens' power might also be too much for even him. Can Dr. Saotome build a new Getter Robo in time to help save Great Mazinger, Japan, and the entire world?
search.title: 大魔神对盖塔机器人G 空中大冲击
